tickets.title: Cannot access email
tickets.description: I'm unable to login to my email account. Getting authentication error.
tickets.resolution: Password was expired. Reset password and enabled 2FA.

tickets.title: Payroll query for December

tickets.resolution: Tax deductions were calculated incorrectly. Corrected and refund processed.

tickets.title: Leave balance inquiry
tickets.description: Need to know my remaining leave balance for the year.
tickets.resolution: Leave balance: 12 days. Details sent via email.

tickets.title: Software installation request
tickets.description: Need Adobe Creative Suite installed on my workstation.
tickets.resolution: Adobe Creative Suite installed and activated. License details shared.

tickets.title: VPN connection issues
tickets.description: Unable to connect to VPN from home. Getting timeout error.
tickets.resolution: VPN certificate expired. New certificate issued and configured.
